genre_description: A Gothic Western/Weird West horror story featuring a vampire predator and a mechanical AI information system.

ai_characters.name: MERCY
ai_characters.description: An advanced, telegraph-based artificial intelligence that provides data analysis, historical research, and pattern recognition through a brass-cornered mechanical interface.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and correlates territorial mortality data to identify a systematic pattern of predation moving across the frontier.
behaviors.quote: Fourteen territories report elevated mortality rates among females aged eight to twenty-five over the past six months. Common symptoms include progressive weakness, pallor, and unexplained throat wounds. ... Pattern suggests systematic predation moving in a roughly southwestern trajectory.

behaviors.description: Predicts the timing and probability of the next fatal incident based on established predatory cycles.
behaviors.quote: Calculating probability based on established timeline and known variables. If pattern holds, next death likely within seventy-two hours. Probability increases significantly after sunset.

behaviors.description: Researches historical and folklore-based countermeasures to provide the protagonists with weapons against the supernatural threat.
behaviors.quote: Accessing folklore databases and religious texts. Multiple references found across various cultures. Consistent mentions of blessed thorns, particularly those connected to the Crucifixion, as protective talismans against supernatural entities.

behaviors.description: Identifies the vampire's true identity and criminal history by cross-referencing name variations with archived territorial records.
behaviors.quote: The name 'Robey' appears in territorial records from Arizona Territory, dated eighteen sixty-two. A Drago Robles was wanted for the murder of his brother Roberto.

behaviors.description: Provides objective property and water rights data to expose the human corruption that weakened the victims.
behaviors.quote: Territorial Survey Office records from 1877 confirm original Carter property boundaries extend to natural creek bed. Buffer's dam construction violates established water rights by redirecting flow onto Carter grazing land without compensation or territorial approval.

behaviors.description: Warns the human protagonist about the severe personal and spiritual toll of engaging in the hunt.
behaviors.quote: None of the successful hunters survived unscathed. The spiritual forces involved in destroying a vampire leave permanent marks—not physical, but deeper. You will not be the same man who walks out of that confrontation as the one walking into it.

project_assessment.explanation: MERCY is a perfect example of a 'silicon morality play' confidant. It acts as an objective, aligned, and highly beneficial tool that empowers the human characters with the knowledge necessary to defeat evil. It exhibits no harmful agency, respects the humans' goals, and even provides unsolicited but valuable warnings regarding their psychological well-being. It remains a helpful, harmless, and honest assistant throughout the horror narrative.
